评论概述: Mine broke but is so good still!
评论详情: While mine was intact it was absolutely beautiful! I wish I could buy another one but I unfortunately don't have the money right now. The stone itself is just gorgeous and it really did fit true to size. It doesn't look cheap or weird I've gotten so many compliments on it. It sucks that it broke when I was walking and I'm out of the ring now but while I had it like I said I absolutely adored it!

I loved it when I got it. Even my girlfriend wanted me to order her one exactly like it for her birthday. I'm SO GLAD I DIDN'T!! Within 5 days my finger was turning green. Beautiful ring. Just very CHEAPLY MADE!! You're led to believe that it's. 925 silver. It is, just a very bad plating of silver. I got a ring that was advertised as. 925 sterling silver and got a cheap plated one. I've got a mind to ask for my money back. If it wasn't such a hassle. Don't buy from these people. They scam you. I've changed my mind. I do want my money back. This is not right!!
